entry.title: Welcome to the KC Tech Group!
entry.content: Welcome to the Kansas City Technology Group! We are a group of technology and automation enthusiasts that meet periodically to discover new gadgets, tech, software, and more! Weâ€™re just getting some things rolling, so stay tuned for more content and information soon.
